string-array.name: ceoNames
string-array.item: CEO: Bernardus Cornelis Margriet van Beurden

string-array.name: companyInfo
string-array.item: Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd. engages in the provision of commercial banking and financial services.
JPMorgan Chase & Co. is a financial holding company, which provides financial and investment banking services.
China Construction Bank Corp. engages in the provision of financial and banking services.
Agricultural Bank of China engages in the provision of international commercial banking and financial services.
Bank of America Corp. is a bank and financial holding company, which engages in the provision of banking and nonbank financial services.
Apple, Inc. engages in the design, manufacture, and marketing of mobile communication, media devices, personal computers, and portable digital music players.
Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. of China Ltd. engages in the provision of financial products and services.
Bank of China Ltd. engages in the provision of banking and related financial services such as commercial and investment banking, and insurance and investment services.
Royal Dutch Shell Plc engages in the oil and natural gas production.
Wells Fargo & Co. is a bank holding company that engages in the provision of banking, insurance, investments, mortgage, and consumer and commercial finance.
Exxon Mobil Corp. engages in the exploration, development, and distribution of oil, gas, and petroleum products.
AT&T, Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the provision of telecommunications and digital entertainment services.
Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing and selling of electronics and computer peripherals
Citigroup, Inc. is a global financial services holding company specializes in banking and financial solutions.
